site_name: Site At 19 Great Eastern Street And 9
description: Non material amendment to planning approval 2021/0406, approved 26/9/23 for the "Demolition of existing office building and erection of new office building of 8 storeys (plus basement) with roof plant enclosure and erection of building for use as a hotel and associated restaurant facilities of 12 storeys (plus basement) with roof plant enclosure, public realm and other associated work". Non material changes include the rewording of conditions 4 (demolition and construction management plan), 5 (details of elevations), 6 (details of materials), 7 (fire strategy) and 13 (energy systems) to ensure all refer to either ‘relevant part of the development’ or to ‘each building’, or ‘part of a building’.
